FFlagReverbAbsorptionField.mechanism: This flag activates a feature that adjusts how sound behaves in different environments within the game.
FFlagReverbAbsorptionField.purpose: It enhances the audio experience by making sounds more realistic based on the surroundings, improving immersion.

DFFlagVideoWinHwEncoderDeleteIfNoPool_St.mechanism: This flag allows the system to remove a video encoding tool if it’s not being used effectively.
DFFlagVideoWinHwEncoderDeleteIfNoPool_St.purpose: It optimizes performance by ensuring that only necessary tools are running, which can lead to smoother gameplay and better video quality.

FFlagISREarlyFilterAnimatedJoints.mechanism: This flag enables a feature that filters animated joints in the game earlier in the process.
FFlagISREarlyFilterAnimatedJoints.purpose: It helps improve performance and reduces lag by managing animations more efficiently.

FFlagUIBloxTruncateExperienceTileMetadat.mechanism: This flag allows the text at the bottom of experience tiles to be shortened automatically.
FFlagUIBloxTruncateExperienceTileMetadat.purpose: It makes the interface cleaner and easier to read by preventing text overflow.

DFIntBadgeServiceMaximumBadgeGetCount_Pl.mechanism: This flag sets a limit on how many badges can be retrieved at once when filtering by place.
DFIntBadgeServiceMaximumBadgeGetCount_Pl.purpose: It helps manage server load and ensures players get badge information more quickly.

FFlagInternalExportHandleMisnamedR15Bone.mechanism: This flag fixes issues with incorrectly named bones in R15 character models during export.
FFlagInternalExportHandleMisnamedR15Bone.purpose: It ensures that character models work correctly in games, preventing bugs and improving player experience.

FFlagPurchasePromptPriceShouldUseProduct.mechanism: This flag changes the purchase prompt to show the price based on updated product information.
FFlagPurchasePromptPriceShouldUseProduct.purpose: It ensures players see accurate pricing, reducing confusion and improving the purchasing process.

FFlagFoundationPseudoChildSelectors.mechanism: This flag allows developers to use special selectors in their code to target specific child elements in a more flexible way.
FFlagFoundationPseudoChildSelectors.purpose: It helps developers create more complex and visually appealing user interfaces by making it easier to style and manage elements.

FFlagRemoveRespawnShortcutFromRespawnCon.mechanism: This flag removes the quick respawn option that players could use after dying in a game.
FFlagRemoveRespawnShortcutFromRespawnCon.purpose: It ensures that players confirm their respawn, which can help prevent accidental respawns and enhance the gaming experience.

FFlagStudioUseUIThread.mechanism: This flag enables the Roblox Studio to handle user interface tasks on a separate thread, improving performance.
FFlagStudioUseUIThread.purpose: It makes the Studio run smoother and faster when working with UI, allowing developers to create better games without lag.

FFlagCoreComponentManagerEmitAssetDMKeyT.mechanism: This flag allows the system to track and report data about assets used in games for better management.
FFlagCoreComponentManagerEmitAssetDMKeyT.purpose: It helps Roblox understand how assets are used, leading to improvements in asset management and overall game performance.

FFlagDisableEtcFallback.mechanism: This flag disables a fallback option that would automatically switch to a different method if the primary one fails.
FFlagDisableEtcFallback.purpose: It ensures that players experience the intended game features without unexpected changes, leading to a more consistent gameplay experience.

FFlagAXCategoryPillPositionAnimation.mechanism: This flag controls the animation of category pills in the user interface.
FFlagAXCategoryPillPositionAnimation.purpose: It makes the interface smoother and more visually appealing when users interact with category options.

DFFlagInferredCrashReportToBacktraceRegi.mechanism: This flag helps in sending crash reports to a system that tracks errors more effectively.
DFFlagInferredCrashReportToBacktraceRegi.purpose: It helps developers identify and fix issues faster, leading to a more stable gaming experience for players.

DFFlagProductInfoBatchingEnabled2_PlaceF.mechanism: This flag enables grouping product information requests to reduce the number of server calls.
DFFlagProductInfoBatchingEnabled2_PlaceF.purpose: It speeds up the loading of product information, making it quicker for players to find and purchase items.

DFFlagVideoWinHwEncoderDeleteIfNoPool.mechanism: This flag manages the deletion of video encoding resources if they are not needed.
DFFlagVideoWinHwEncoderDeleteIfNoPool.purpose: It optimizes system resources, ensuring smoother video playback and recording for players.

FFlagAddFriendsEmptyStateUpdate.mechanism: This flag updates the display when a user has no friends added.
FFlagAddFriendsEmptyStateUpdate.purpose: It provides a clearer and more inviting message to encourage players to add friends, enhancing social interaction.

FFlagAXRemoveTryOnManagerAvatarScreen.mechanism: This flag disables a feature that manages avatar try-on screens.
FFlagAXRemoveTryOnManagerAvatarScreen.purpose: It simplifies the avatar customization process for players by removing unnecessary steps.

FFlagReconnectToSameServer_Staged.mechanism: This flag allows players to reconnect to the same game server they were on if they get disconnected.
FFlagReconnectToSameServer_Staged.purpose: It helps players continue their game without losing progress or having to find a new server.

FFlagPassTextAlignmentRelevancyInfo_Stag.mechanism: This flag improves how text alignment information is handled in game interfaces.
FFlagPassTextAlignmentRelevancyInfo_Stag.purpose: It makes text display more readable and visually appealing for players.

DFFlagEditableMeshFastClusterSkipLoD.mechanism: This flag speeds up the loading of complex 3D models by skipping certain detail levels.
DFFlagEditableMeshFastClusterSkipLoD.purpose: It enhances performance and reduces loading times for players, making the game run smoother.

DFIntLoadTestStartTimeUnix_PlaceFilter.mechanism: This flag sets a specific time for testing how well different game places load.
DFIntLoadTestStartTimeUnix_PlaceFilter.purpose: It helps developers understand loading performance, leading to better experiences for players.

FFlagCustomDspBaseSupportsSidechain.mechanism: This flag allows the audio system to use a feature called sidechain compression, which helps manage sound levels better.
FFlagCustomDspBaseSupportsSidechain.purpose: It improves the overall audio experience in games by making sounds clearer and more balanced.

DFIntLoadTestParticipationPerMillionUser.mechanism: This flag controls how many users can participate in a load test based on the number of players in a specific game.
DFIntLoadTestParticipationPerMillionUser.purpose: It helps developers test their games under different conditions to ensure they can handle many players without issues.

FFlagAddDismissTopBarFocus.mechanism: This flag enables a feature that allows players to easily close or dismiss the top bar in the game interface.
FFlagAddDismissTopBarFocus.purpose: It gives players more control over their screen space, making the game interface cleaner and easier to navigate.

DFIntRobloxTelemetryLoadTestEndThrottleH.mechanism: This flag manages the rate at which data is collected during load tests, helping to limit the amount of information gathered.
DFIntRobloxTelemetryLoadTestEndThrottleH.purpose: It ensures that the game runs smoothly by preventing too much data from slowing things down during testing.

FFlagUnsyncBreakpointsInClonedScripts.mechanism: This flag allows scripts that are copied to run independently without being tied to the original script's settings.
FFlagUnsyncBreakpointsInClonedScripts.purpose: It helps developers create more flexible and efficient scripts, making it easier to manage game logic.

DFFlagRemoveTemporaryScreenshotFilePresa.mechanism: This flag removes the temporary files created before saving screenshots.
DFFlagRemoveTemporaryScreenshotFilePresa.purpose: It helps to save storage space and improve performance by not keeping unnecessary files.

FFlagEnableSpatialUIScalingFix.mechanism: This flag adjusts the scaling of user interface elements based on their 3D position in the game.
FFlagEnableSpatialUIScalingFix.purpose: It ensures that UI elements look consistent and are easier to interact with, regardless of where they are in the game world.

FFlagIsrMainMetrics_Staged.mechanism: This flag enables a new way of tracking important performance metrics for the game.
FFlagIsrMainMetrics_Staged.purpose: It helps developers understand how the game is performing, which can lead to improvements and a better experience for players.

FFlagAXCategoryPillAnimationsUserMotionS.mechanism: This flag allows for animations of category pills to respond to user movements.
FFlagAXCategoryPillAnimationsUserMotionS.purpose: It makes the interface more dynamic and engaging, enhancing the overall user experience.

FFlagVoiceChatClientRewrite_OneFlagToRul.mechanism: This flag consolidates various settings and features related to voice chat into a single system.
FFlagVoiceChatClientRewrite_OneFlagToRul.purpose: It simplifies the voice chat experience, making it more reliable and easier to use for players.

DFFlagAndroidDebugHeapTelemetry.mechanism: This flag enables a feature that collects data about memory usage on Android devices.
DFFlagAndroidDebugHeapTelemetry.purpose: It helps developers understand how their games use memory on Android, allowing them to make improvements and fix issues.

DFIntDataStoreOrderedGetFixedRequestLimi.mechanism: This flag sets a limit on how many requests can be made to retrieve data from the game’s storage, specifically when filtering by place.
DFIntDataStoreOrderedGetFixedRequestLimi.purpose: It ensures that games run smoothly by preventing too many requests at once, which can slow down performance or cause errors.
